short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove the feed from LinkedIn for a less distracting experience

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: I've often found myself logging onto LinkedIn to respond to a message, only to lose 20 minutes by mindlessly scrolling the newsfeed. This extension is simple plug n play chrome extension that hides the newsfeed while browsing LinkedIn.
